interface.name: org.chromium.ModemManager.Modem.Gobi
interface.tp:docstring: Gobi-specific features for use in test and debugging.

method.name: ActivateManual
method.tp:docstring: Sets modem configuration data. Unlike regular Activate(), this does not contact the carrier. It does, however, reset the modem.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary of properties to set on the modem. Keys include 'mdn', 'min'

method.name: ActivateManualDebug
method.tp:docstring: Workaround for the fact that dbus-send cannot send dictionaries of variants. Calls ActivateManual, with system_id converted to int.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary of properties to set on the modem. Keys include MDN, MIN, and others

method.name: PowerCycle
method.tp:docstring: Tells the modem to power cycle itself.

method.name: SetCarrier
method.tp:docstring: Prepares the modem to use the given carrier. Modem will reset after this is called.

method.name: SoftReset
method.tp:docstring: Tells the module to do a soft reset and waits for the reset to complete.
